stories.text: hi! i'm currently a 3rd year undergraduate computer science student and i'm still looking internships this summer. i have experience in software development and object oriented programming. i'm a quick learner and hard worker and would love to connect with anyone discussing any possible opportunities for this summer. thank you in advance!
stories.title: Looking for SWE Internships

stories.text:
A simple but elegant todo list on your chrome's new tab, to keep you reminder and on track.

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/new-tab-reminder/mcgmfombdolcfpnbcefghclidgbdabih?hl=en-GB&authuser=0

We do not track or store or share any user data. The code is also opensource.

https://github.com/coderhs/new-tab-reminders
stories.title: Show HN: Reminder list on your Chrome browser new tab
